variables-naming-conventions_key2: It is very important to give correct `name`to a `Variable`.
variables-naming-conventions_key3: If you don't give names properly,then nobody will be able to read your `Code`, as they won't be able to understand that for what purpose the `variable` is used?
variables-naming-conventions_key4:
camelCase
PascalCase
snake_case
UPPER_CASE
kebab-case
are five most popular cases for naming.
variables-naming-conventions_key23: start with is, can or has
variables-naming-conventions_key28: ### P.S: Many candidates get rejected in their interviews, because they don't name the `variables` properly, and the company does not like this.
